from math import *

n=int(raw_input())

odd=0
even=0

foo=[]

s=raw_input().split()


foo=[0 for i in range(n)] 

for j in range(0,n):
    foo[j]=int(s[j])
    
for j in range(0,n):
    
    if(foo[j]%2==0):
        even= even+1
        
    else:
        odd=odd+1


zoom=even-odd
print(int(fabs(zoom)))
